page.title: 05"EAST KILBRIDE NEWS"
page.content: {"EAST KILBRIDE NEWS" Our local newspaper likes to publish the achievements of the young people in East Kilbride. {TRIO KNOW THEIR MATHS.} Three East Kilbride school pupils have won prizes in the 1985 SCOTTISH MATHS CHALLENGE COMPETITION. The competitors had to reason their way through four rounds of Mathematical puzzles which were specially chosen to test logical and original thought. For example..... "I can never remember the number of my Cash Dispensing Machine Card but I can work it out when reversed digits form a number which is four times the original number....What is the number? 2178. {FOOTBALL..Our school,BLACKLAW PRIMARY, {Won the PRIMARY SCHOOLS FOOTBALL {LEAGUE this year and the team photo- {graph appeared in the "E.K.NEWS" }
